doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes material from artists, among others, Joyce Melander-Dayton, Tacita Dean, Claudia DeMonte, Robert DeNiro, Sr., Jan Dibbets, Lesley Dill, Kim Dingle, Lois Dodd, Tara Donovan, Jim Dow, Sally Hazelet Drummond, and Valerie Duncan. Also includes a DIA brochure on the Hanne Darboven exhibition, "Kulturgeschichte 1880-1983, 1980-83", with a biography of the artist. Includes a Whitney brochure and postcard on the E.V. Day: G-Force exhibition. Includes a NYU Grey Art Gallery brochure on the exhibition, "Diebenkorn in New Mexico". Also includes a Morgan Library brochure on the temporary installation of 3 scultures by Mark di Suvero at the Morgan. Includes a Smith College Museum of Art brochure on the installation, "Portals, Pivots, and Perspectives: An Installation by Patrick Dougherty". Also includes a Zabriskie Gallery brochure on a Marcel Duchamp exhibition, "Marcel Duchamp on Display: Optics, Exhibition Installations, Portable Museums".
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> D (Set 2)
